cpaPage.mainheading: Career Opportunities After CPA in India

opportunities.title: Super Accountants
opportunities.caption: CPAs are Super Accountants, those who have mastered their craft of Accounting, auditing, taxation and other areas of Accounting

opportunities.title: International Credibility
opportunities.caption: CPAs enjoy internationally recognition for their expertise and high standards.

opportunities.title: Mandatory for High Profile Roles
opportunities.caption: The CPA designation is mandatory for many high-profile roles such as Vice President, President, Head, CXOâ€™s etc.

opportunities.title: Better pay scale
opportunities.caption: Better pay scale: Average salary of a beginner CPA in India is about INR 7,00,000 per annum.

cpaPage.para: Simandhar Education has various corporate tie-ups and elite industry relations that we leverage to place our clients in the top accounting firms round the year.
